full_description:
\n
Business Analyst – Job located in South Plainfield, NJ and various unanticipated client sites. Define the scope of the project. Gather business requirements, analyze system specifications, and prepare functional specification documents. Convert the user requirements into business requirements for configuration of SAP SD/PS modules. Create Test Plans/Cases based on user/functional specifications. Create Application Use Case specifications, business flow diagrams, Activity/State diagrams and Sequence diagrams. Requires experience with SAP ECC, ABAP, and MS Office. Travel to various unanticipated locations throughout the U.S. to interact with clients and train end users for long and short term assignments. Requires bachelor’s in computer science, engineering (any), business administration or related and 2 yrs experience in job offered or as a Computer Software Professional. Will accept 4 yrs experience in job offered or as a CSP in lieu of bachelor’s + 2 yrs.
Offered salary is $104,000 P/Y.
\n
